briefdescription.para: Output Data published at the end of cycle.
Counter for invalid or failed reads from custom layer.
Radio Control Input (RCIN) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Radio Control Input Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Radio Control Input (RCIN) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Radio Control Input application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) RCIN data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the RCIN application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by RCIN application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the RCIN application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the RCIN application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Receive and process messages from the scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the RCIN application from the SCH pipe. This function will pend for the type defined by iBlocking, allowing it to wait for messages, i.e. wakeup messages from scheduler.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

briefdescription.para: Radio Control Input Task incoming command processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming commands subscribed by RCIN application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Radio Control Input Task application commands.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes command messages specific to the RCIN application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sends the housekeeping message

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function publishes the InputRcMsg message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function verifies the command message length.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message

simplesect.para: if the message length matches expectations, FALSE if it does not.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function calls the custom layer to read from the device and updates the InputRC message with current values.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
